name: Config 2022 - It’s better when we design together / Lichin Lin
description:
In this talk, Lichin will share five stories about designing together on different scales, from a group of product designers at PicCollage, the local Figma community, to a classroom with 50 students.


Learn about various ways to collaborate on design in Figma, and bring back some ideas and tips to try yourself. No matter what you're working on, it's always better and more fun when we can design together — you never know what amazing results you'll get at the end!
